content: free crochet pattern «hero turtle» by tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile hi there my name is tanya ᴗ i hope you ll love the pattern as much as i do enjoy crocheting this pattern and photographs are copyright 2022 © - tatyanabocharova all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only and may not be resold translated published shared redistributed in part or in full without the authorization thank you for understanding free patterns https //www ravelry com/stores/tanyaasmilecrochet shop patterns https //www etsy com/shop/shopforthepatterns instagram www instagram com/tanyaasmile e-mail ssmilebon@gmail com designer tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile please read through the entire pattern abbreviations before starting your project magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain stitch materials slip_stitch - slip_stitch 2 00 mm crochet hook single_crochet - single_crochet 8 mm black safety eyes increase - increase yarnart jeans 55% cotton 45% acryl decrease - decrease 50g/160m next colors green blue gray double_crochet - double_crochet brown light brown half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet toys filler blo - through back loops only scissors flo - front loops only tapestry needle … x n - repeat stitches in brackets n times pins stitch marker notes crochet continuously in a spiral unless finished size otherwise specified no need to close each approx 15 cm/ 5 9 tall using the row with a slip_stitch materials stated in the pattern if you in order to not lose track of the number use a different hook and yarn final of worked stitches in each round use a measures will vary stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round crochet with tight stitches use smaller hook to avoid holes designer tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile head crochet with green yarn 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 6 increase 12 3 1 single_crochet increase x6 18 4 2 single_crochet increase x6 24 5 3 single_crochet increase x6 30 6 4 single_crochet increase x6 36 7 5 single_crochet increase x6 42 8 6 single_crochet increase x6 48 9 - 12 48 single_crochet 48 continue on with blue 13 - 16 48 single_crochet 48 continue on with green 17 7 single_crochet increase x6 54 18 - 20 54 single_crochet 54 21 7 single_crochet decrease x6 48 22 6 single_crochet decrease x6 42 23 5 single_crochet decrease x6 36 24 4 single_crochet decrease x6 30 place safety eyes between rounds 14 & 15 8 st apart start to stuff the head 25 3 single_crochet decrease x6 24 26 2 single_crochet decrease x6 18 27 4 single_crochet decrease x3 15 fasten_off leave a long yarn to sew designer tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile stuff legs body firmly stuffing as you go leg 1 start working with green yarn 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 6 increase 12 3 1 single_crochet increase x6 18 4 18 single_crochet 18 5 6 single_crochet 4 decrease 4 single_crochet 14 6 6 single_crochet 2 decrease 4 single_crochet 12 7 12 single_crochet 12 continue on with blue 8 - 9 12 single_crochet 12 continue on with green 10 12 single_crochet 12 11 crochet 11 single_crochet fasten_off
